meanings.sent1: I will rebuy my favorite book next week.
meanings.sent2: She decided to rebuy the toy she lost.
meanings.sent3: After losing his lucky pen, he had to rebuy it.
meanings.sent4: The memories were so precious, he had to rebuy them.
meanings.sent5: She couldn't resist the urge to rebuy the delicious cookies.

meanings.sent1: He promised to rebuy the bike from his friend.
meanings.sent2: The pawnshop allowed him to rebuy his watch.
meanings.sent3: The magician had to rebuy his own rabbit for the show.
meanings.sent4: She had to rebuy her childhood home to keep it in the family.
meanings.sent5: The hero had to rebuy his sword to defeat the dragon.

meanings.sent1: She had to rebuy her concert ticket after losing it.
meanings.sent2: The collector decided to rebuy the rare stamp.
meanings.sent3: He had to rebuy his stolen car from the thieves.
meanings.sent4: The artist had to rebuy his own painting at an auction.
meanings.sent5: The antique vase was so beautiful, she had to rebuy it.
